subject: Simsonn Plus X brake problem
description_text:
Hello, recently i bought the Simsonn Plus X pedals ( all 3 of them ) and i have problem with the brake inputs . It cannot read the correct inputs and i cannot calibrate it either .
Looking forward to hearing from you soon
Kostas Kordatos


Sent from Outlook for Android

conversations.body_text: Hi Kostas Kordatos,  Please use the Offset function to zero the white initial signal of the pedal. Also, provide a photo of the brake pedal installation, and I will assist you in checking it.

I tried  the offset but nothing changed, the values are weird
Throttle 1888
Brake 774
Clutch 1910

Throttle and clutch work perfectly.
  I attach the photos of the installation of the brake and the control box in my rig.

Wheel drive is Fanatec csl dd  8nm , if it matters .
Looking forward for your quick response

Sent from Outlook for Android

Hey guys, i need to solve this asap please , any news regarding my problem ??

Sent from Outlook for Android
Hi Kostas Kordatos,    Hello, your racing bracket is obstructing the movement of the brake sensor, causing the brake pedal to be unresponsive. Please adjust the installation accordingly.

Thanks a lot guys for the response! Luckily it was exactly what  you said , everything works perfectly fine now ! Appreciated, cheers
